siteMetadata.defaultTitle: Website Change Monitoring Products and Services
siteMetadata.preamble: We're a Portland, Oregon-based team of data scientists and software engineers.
siteMetadata.defaultDescription: We develop our own products; and provide software engineering services to Enterprise customers.
siteMetadata.postamble: Think we can help your project? We'd love to hear from you:

node.html:
Since 2008, our flagship website change monitoring product, Versionista, has provided actionable insights from website change detection to 1000s of businesses.

Tech highlights:

-

Designed for IT staff, Fluxguard enables sophisticated session orchestration to monitor, alert, and archive website changes.

Tech stack:

  • CloudFormation
  • AWS Fargate
  • DynamoDB
  • React.js

With "zero configuration," Deep Dive Duck provides deep competitive insights from changes detected across your competitors' sites.

Tech highlights:

  • 100% Lambda backend
  • Google headless Chrome + Puppeteer

Our primary focus for over 10 years has been automated crawling, processing, and monitoring changes across millions of websites. We excel at the "tools of the trade" for this big data experience.

We complement "traditional" data modeling with machine learning and artificial intelligence.

• Robust, scalable, and self-healing
  • Python, Node.js, React.js, and more
  • Infrastructure as Code
  • NoOps / DevOps
  • AWS "everything": from Lambda to Fargate, to DynamoDB and beyond
  • Agile, Waterfall, and "wet agile" (bit of both!)

We excel at complex product development.

We've brought products to market across the globe: both customer-facing and internal.

We particularly love leading and aligning multiple stakeholders in multi-region Enterprise initiatives (really!).
